sentences.text: Dear Stockholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are cordially invited to attend the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders of Moodys Corporation to be held on Tuesday, April 25, 2017, at 9:30 a.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EDT at the Companys offices at 7 World Trade Center at 250 Greenwich Street, New York, New York.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice of Annual Meeting and Proxy Statement accompanying this letter describe the business to be acted upon at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Report for the year ended December 31, 2016 is also enclosed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On March 15, 2017, we mailed to many of our stockholders a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials (the Notice) containing instructions on how to access our 2017 Proxy Statement and 2016 Annual Report and vote online.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice included instructions on how to request a paper or e-mail copy of the proxy materials, including the Notice of Annual Meeting, Proxy Statement, Annual Report, and proxy card or voting instruction card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders who requested paper copies of the proxy materials or previously elected to receive the proxy materials electronically did not receive a Notice and will receive the proxy materials in the format requested.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you plan to attend the annual meeting, we encourage you to review the proxy materials and hope you will vote as soon as possible.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote by proxy over the Internet or by telephone by using the instructions provided in the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Alternatively, if you requested and received paper copies of the proxy materials by mail, you can also vote by mail by following the instructions on the proxy card or voting instruction card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting over the Internet, by telephone or by written proxy or voting instruction card will ensure your representation at the annual meeting regardless of whether you attend in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instructions regarding the three methods of voting are contained in the Notice or proxy card or voting instruction card.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are the beneficial owner of your shares (meaning that your shares are held in the name of a bank, broker or other nominee), you may receive a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials from that firm containing instructions that you must follow in order for your shares to be voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain institutions offer telephone and Internet voting.

sentences.text: The firm that holds your shares is not permitted to vote on the matters to be considered at the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders, other than to ratify the appointment of KPMG LLP, unless you provide specific instructions by following the instructions from your broker about voting your shares by telephone or Internet or completing and returning the voting instruction card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For your vote to be counted in the election of directors, on the advisory resolution approving executive compensation, and on the advisory resolution on the frequency of future advisory resolutions approving executive compensation, you will need to communicate your voting decisions to your bank, broker or other holder of record before the date of the annual meeting.

sentences.text: Voting your shares is important to ensure that you have a say in the governance of the Company and to fulfill the objectives of the majority voting standard that Moodys Corporation applies in the election of directors.

sentences.text: Please review the proxy materials and follow the relevant instructions to vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We hope you will exercise your rights and fully participate as a stockholder in the future of Moodys Corporation.

sentences.text: General
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement is being furnished to the holders of the common stock, par value $0.01 per share (the Common Stock), of Moodys Corporation (Moodys or the Company) in connection with the solicitation of proxies by the Board of Directors of the Company (the Board of Directors or the Board) for use in voting at the Annual Meeting of Stockholders or any adjournment or postponement thereof (the Annual Meeting).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Meeting will be held on Tuesday, April 25, 2017, at 9:30 a.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EDT at the Companys principal executive offices located at 7 World Trade Center at 250 Greenwich Street, New York, New York 10007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To obtain directions to attend the Annual Meeting and vote in person, please contact the Companys Investor Relations Department by sending an e-mail to ir@moodys.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement and the accompanying proxy card are first being made available to stockholders on or about March 15, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys telephone number is (212) 553-0300.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Meeting Admission
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders will need an admission ticket to enter the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For stockholders of record, an admission ticket is available over the Internet, or, if you requested paper copies, you will receive a printed proxy card and a printed admission ticket.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you plan to attend the Annual Meeting in person, please retain and bring the admission ticket.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are the beneficial owner of your shares (meaning that your shares are held in the name of a bank, broker or other nominee) and you plan to attend the Annual Meeting in person, you may obtain an admission ticket in advance by sending a written request, along with proof of share ownership such as a bank or brokerage account statement, to the Corporate Secretary of the Company at 7 World Trade Center at 250 Greenwich Street, New York, New York 10007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An admission ticket is also available over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders who do not have admission tickets will be admitted following verification of ownership at the door.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Internet Availability of Proxy Materials
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (the SEC) rules, we are furnishing proxy materials to our stockholders primarily via the Internet, instead of mailing printed copies of those materials to stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On March 15, 2017, we mailed to our stockholders (other than those who previously requested e-mail or paper delivery) a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials (the Notice) containing instructions on how to access and review our proxy materials, including this Proxy Statement and the Companys Annual Report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These materials are available at: https://materials.proxyvote.com/615369.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice also instructs you on how to access your proxy card to vote through the Internet or by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This process is designed to expedite stockholders receipt of proxy materials, lower the cost of the Annual Meeting, and help conserve natural resources.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a Notice by mail, you will not receive a printed copy of the proxy materials unless you request one.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you would prefer to receive printed proxy materials, please follow the instructions included in the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you have previously elected to receive our proxy materials electronically, you will continue to receive these materials via e-mail unless you elect otherwise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Record Date
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has fixed the close of business on February 28, 2017 as the record date (the Record Date) for the determination of stockholders entitled to notice of, and to vote at, the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the close of business on the Record Date, there were 191,019,512 shares of Common Stock outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each holder of Common Stock entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting will be entitled to one vote per share.

sentences.text: How to Vote
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to voting in person at the Annual Meeting, stockholders of record can vote by proxy by following the instructions in the Notice and using the Internet or by calling the toll-free telephone number that is available on the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Alternatively, stockholders of record who requested a paper copy of the proxy materials can vote by proxy by mailing their signed proxy cards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The telephone and Internet voting procedures are designed to authenticate stockholders identities, to allow stockholders to give their voting instructions and to confirm that stockholders instructions have been recorded properly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in the name of a bank, broker or other nominee, you may receive a Notice from that firm containing instructions that you must follow in order for your shares to be voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain institutions offer telephone and Internet voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received the proxy materials in paper form, the materials include a voting instruction card so you can instruct the holder of record on how to vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you wish to vote in person at the Annual Meeting, you must obtain a legal proxy from the bank, broker or other nominee that holds your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Special Voting Procedures for Certain Current and Former Employees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Many current and former employees of the Company have share balances in the Moodys Common Stock Fund of the Moodys Corporation Profit Participation Plan (the Profit Participation Plan).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The voting procedures described above do not apply to these share balances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instead, any proxy given by such an employee or former employee will serve as a voting instruction for the trustee of the Profit Participation Plan, as well as a proxy for any shares registered in that persons own name (including shares acquired under the Moodys Corporation Employee Stock Purchase Plan and/or pursuant to restricted stock awards).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To allow sufficient time for voting by the trustee, Profit Participation Plan voting instructions must be received by April 20, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If voting instructions have not been received by that date, or properly completed and executed voting instructions are not provided, the trustee will vote those Profit Participation Plan shares in the same proportion as the Profit Participation Plan shares for which it has received instructions, except as otherwise required by law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Quorum and Voting Requirements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The holders of a majority of the outstanding shares of Common Stock entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting, whether present in person or represented by proxy, will constitute a quorum for the transaction of business at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a quorum is not present at the Annual Meeting, the stockholders present may adjourn the Annual Meeting from time to time, without notice, other than by announcement at the meeting, until a quorum is present or represented.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At any such adjourned meeting at which a quorum is present or represented, any business may be transacted that might have been transacted at the original meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes will be counted for purposes of determining whether a quorum is present at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A broker non-vote occurs when a nominee (such as a bank, broker or other nominee) holding shares for a beneficial owner does not vote on a particular proposal because the nominee does not have discretionary voting power for that particular matter and has not received instructions from the beneficial owner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Elections.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to the Companys by-laws, the nominees for director are required to receive a majority of the votes cast with respect to such nominees in order to be elected at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A majority of the votes cast means that the number of shares voted for a director must exceed the number of votes cast against that director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions have no effect on the election of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Brokers do not have discretionary authority to vote shares in the election of directors without instructions from the beneficial owner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, shares resulting in broker non-votes, if any, are not votes cast and will have no effect on the outcome of director elections.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the Companys Director Resignation Policy, each director subject to election at the Annual Meeting was required to submit a contingent resignation that the Board of Directors will consider, following a review and recommendation from the Governance & Nominating Committee, in the event that the director fails to receive a majority of the votes cast.

sentences.text: Advisory Resolutions Approving Executive Compensation and the Frequency of Future Advisory Resolutions Approving Executive Compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The affirmative vote of the majority of the shares present in person or represented by proxy and entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting is required for the advisory resolution approving executive compensation and the advisory resolution on the frequency of future advisory resolutions approving executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the advisory resolution on the frequency of future advisory resolutions approving executive compensation, stockholders will be able to specify one of four choices on the proxy card: One year, Two years, Three years, and Abstain.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If none of the options receives the affirmative vote of the majority of the shares present in person or represented by proxy and entitled to vote, the option that receives the greatest number of votes will be considered the option selected by stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Both resolutions are advisory, meaning that they are not binding on the Board, although the Board will consider the outcome of the votes on these resolutions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a stockholder abstains from voting or directs the stockholders proxy to abstain from voting on either matter, the abstention has the same effect as a vote against the matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Brokers do not have discretionary authority to vote shares on either matter without instructions from the beneficial owner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, shares resulting in broker non-votes, if any, are not entitled to vote on either matter and will have no effect on the outcome of the vote.

sentences.text: Proxies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proxy provides that you may specify that your shares of Common Stock be voted For, Against or Abstain from voting with respect to the director nominees and the other proposals, except the advisory resolution on the frequency of future advisory resolutions approving executive compensation.

sentences.text: For that proposal, the proxy provides four choices: One year, Two years, Three years, and Abstain.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Properly executed proxies that do not contain voting instructions will be voted in accordance with the recommendations of the Board of Directors, except as noted above with respect to shares held in the Profit Participation Plan.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To assist it in making determinations of a directors independence, the Board has adopted independence standards that are set forth below and are also included in the Companys Corporate Governance Principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that Mr. Anderson, Mr. Bermudez, Dr. Duffie, Ms. Hill, Mr. Kist, Dr. McKinnell, Ms. Seidman and Mr. Van Saun, and thus a majority of the directors on the Board, are independent under these
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents

sentences.text: standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Board had previously determined that Mr. John K. Wulff, who retired from the Board effective April 12, 2016, the date of Moodys 2016 Annual Meeting, was independent under these standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The standards adopted by the Board incorporate the director independence criteria included in the New York Stock Exchange (the NYSE) listing standards, as well as additional criteria established by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee, the Governance & Nominating Committee and the Compensation & Human Resources Committee are composed entirely of independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with NYSE requirements and the independence standards adopted by the Board, all members of the Audit Committee and the Compensation & Human Resources Committee meet additional heightened independence standards applicable to audit committee and compensation committee members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An independent director is a director whom the Board has determined has no material relationship with the Company or any of its consolidated subsidiaries (for purposes of this section, collectively referred to as the Company), either directly, or as a partner, stockholder or officer of an organization that has a relationship with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of this definition, the Board has determined that a director is not independent if:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. the director is, or in the past three years has been, an employee of the Company, or an immediate family member of the director is, or in the past three years has been, an executive officer of the Company;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) the director, or an immediate family member of the director, is a current partner of the Companys outside auditor;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) the director is a current employee of the Companys outside auditor;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) a member of the directors immediate family is a current employee of the Companys outside auditor and personally works on the Companys audit; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (d) the director or a immediate family member of the director was in the past three years a partner or employee of the Companys outside auditor and personally worked on the Companys audit within that time;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. the director, or a member of the directors immediate family, is or in the past three years has been, an executive officer of another company where any of the Companys present executive officers serves or served on the compensation committee at the same time;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. the director, or a member of the directors immediate family, has received, during any 12-month period in the past three years, any direct compensation from the Company in excess of $120,000, other than compensation for Board service, compensation received by the directors immediate family member for service as an employee (other than an executive officer) of the Company, and pension or other forms of deferred compensation for prior service with the Company;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. the director is a current executive officer or employee, or a member of the directors immediate family is a current executive officer of another company that makes payments to or receives payments from the Company, or during any of the last three fiscal years, has made payments to or received payments from the Company, for property or services in an amount that, in any single fiscal year, exceeded the greater of $1 million or 2% of the other companys consolidated gross revenues; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. the director, or the directors spouse, is an executive officer of a non-profit organization to which the Company or the Company foundation makes, or in the past three years has made, contributions that, in any single fiscal year, exceeded the greater of $1 million or 2% of the non-profit organizations consolidated gross revenues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (Amounts that the Company foundation contributes under matching gifts programs are not included in the contributions calculated for purposes of this standard.)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An immediate family member includes a directors spouse, parents, children, siblings, mother- and father-in-law, sons- and daughters-in-law, brothers- and sisters-in-law, and anyone (other than a domestic employee) who shares the directors home.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, a director is not considered independent for purposes of serving on the Audit Committee, and may not serve on the Audit Committee, if the director: (a) accepts, directly or indirectly, from Moodys Corporation or any of its subsidiaries, any consulting, advisory, or other compensatory fee, other than Board and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: committee fees and fixed amounts of compensation under a retirement plan (including deferred compensation) for prior service with Moodys Corporation; or (b) is an affiliated person of Moodys Corporation or any of its subsidiaries; each as determined in accordance with SEC regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Furthermore, in determining whether a director is considered independent for purposes of serving on the Compensation & Human Resources Committee, the Board must consider all factors specifically relevant to determining whether the director has a relationship with the Company that is material to that directors ability to be independent from management in connection with the duties of a compensation committee member, including, but not limited to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) the source of the directors compensation, including any consulting, advisory or other compensatory fee paid by the Company to the director; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) whether the director is affiliated with Moodys Corporation, any of its subsidiaries or an affiliate of any subsidiary; each as determined in accordance with SEC regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards Role in the Oversight of Company Risk
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors oversees the Companys enterprise-wide approach to the major risks facing the Company and, with the assistance of the Audit Committee, and the Compensation & Human Resources Committee, oversees the Companys policies for assessing and managing its exposure to risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board periodically reviews these risks and the Companys risk management processes, including in connection with its review of the Companys strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards responsibilities include reviewing the Companys practices with respect to risk assessment and risk management and reviewing contingent liabilities and risks that may be material to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee reviews the Companys policies with respect to risk assessment and risk management, financial and compliance risks, including risks relating to internal controls and cyber risks, and major legislative and regulatory developments which could materially impact the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, at least annually, the Audit Committee reviews the implementation and effectiveness of the Companys enterprise risk management program with the Chief Risk Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation & Human Resources Committee oversees managements assessment of whether the Companys compensation structure, policies and programs create risks that are reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on the Company and reviews the results of this assessment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the oversight of the Board and its committees, the Chief Executive Officer has established an Enterprise-Wide Risk Committee, comprised of the Chief Executive Officer and his direct reports, which include the Chief Risk Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Enterprise Risk Committee reviews the work of the Enterprise Risk Function which is managed by the Chief Risk Officer with the assistance of the Head of Corporate Planning and Treasury and the Head of the Internal Audit Function.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chief Risk Officer chairs a subcommittee consisting of senior executives from each of the Companys major business units and support functions, who periodically report on
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: risks and their mitigations within their areas of responsibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among other things, the Enterprise Risk Function is responsible for identifying and monitoring existing and emerging important risks to the achievement of the Companys strategic and operative objectives; formulating appropriate polices and monitoring and reporting frameworks to support effective management of important risks; reviewing and evaluating the effectiveness of management processes and action plans to address such risks; advising on and recommending to executive management any significant actions or initiatives that they believe are necessary to effectively manage risk; and seeing that activities of discrete risk management disciplines within the Company are appropriately coordinated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chief Risk Officer presented the Enterprise Risk Committees analysis to the Board at two meetings in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, the Audit Committee, the Governance & Nominating Committee and the Compensation & Human Resources Committee reviewed risks within their areas of responsibility at separate meetings in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Significant risk issues evaluated by and/or major changes proposed by the Enterprise-Wide Risk Committee and the Chief Risk Officer are discussed at various Board meetings throughout the year.

sentences.text: All executive officers and directors are subject to a securities trading policy under which they are prohibited from hedging and pledging Moodys securities, including any publicly traded securities of a Moodys subsidiary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specifically, the following activities are prohibited under the policy:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: making short sales of Moodys securities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A short sale has occurred if the seller:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: engaging in speculative transactions or entering into any transaction (including purchasing forward contracts, equity swaps, puts or calls) that are designed to offset any decrease in the market value of or are otherwise based on the price of Moodys securities.

sentences.text: THE AUDIT COMMITTEE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee represents and assists the Board of Directors in its oversight responsibilities relating to: the integrity of the Companys financial statements and the financial information provided to the Companys stockholders and others; the Companys compliance with legal and regulatory requirements; the Companys internal controls; the Companys policies with respect to risk assessment and risk management, and the review of contingent liabilities and risks that might be material to the Company; and the audit process, including the qualifications and independence of the Companys principal external auditors (the Independent Auditors), and the performance of the Independent Auditors and the Companys internal audit function.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of the Audit Committees oversight of the audit process, the Audit Committee and its chairman are directly involved in the selection of the lead engagement partner when there is a rotation required under applicable rules, and the Audit Committee reviews and concurs in the appointment and compensation of the head of the Companys internal audit function.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2015, a new lead engagement partner was designated due to the mandated rotation of this position, and a new head of the internal audit function was appointed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee also approves the fees and terms associated with the retention of the Independent Auditors to perform the annual engagement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fulfilling the responsibilities under its charter, there are a number of specific responsibilities that the Audit Committee performs:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Discusses with, and receives regular status reports from, the Independent Auditors and the head of the internal audit function on the overall scope and plans for their audits, including their scope and plans for evaluating the effectiveness of internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also receives regular updates on the Companys internal control over financial reporting, and discusses with management and the Independent Auditors their evaluations and conclusions with respect to internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meets with the Independent Auditors and the head of the internal audit function, with and without management present, to discuss the results of their respective audits, in addition to holding meetings with members of management, including the general counsel.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews and discusses with management and the Independent Auditors the Companys earnings press releases and the Companys periodic filings made with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews the Companys financial and compliance risks, including, but not limited to, risks relating to internal controls and cyber risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Receives periodic reports on the effectiveness of the Companys compliance program and regular status reports on compliance issues, including reports required by the Audit Committees policy for the receipt and treatment of any complaints received by the Company regarding accounting, internal control, auditing and federal securities law matters
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews its charter annually and conducts an annual self-evaluation to assess its performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also has the authority to engage its own outside advisors, including experts in particular areas of accounting, as it determines appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is directly responsible for the appointment, compensation, retention and oversight of the Independent Auditors and, as such, the Independent Auditors report directly to the Audit Committee.

sentences.text: KPMG LLP has served as the Companys independent auditor since 2008, and was selected at the conclusion of a competitive process that the Audit Committee conducted to review the selection of the Companys independent registered public accounting firm.

sentences.text: When structuring its overall compensation practices for employees of the Company generally, consideration is given as to whether the structure creates incentives for risk-taking behavior and therefore affects the Companys risk management practices.

sentences.text: In order to assess whether the Companys compensation practices and programs create risks that are reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on the Company, management established a compensation risk committee led by the Chief Human Resources Officer to assess the risk related to the Companys compensation plans, practices and programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of this annual review, the compensation risk committee assessed the following items:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the relative proportion of variable to fixed components of compensation,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the mix of performance periods (short-term, medium-term and long-term),
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the mix of payment mechanisms (cash, options, restricted stock, performance shares),
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) the performance metrics used, linking the creation of value and earnings quality and sustainability,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) the process of setting goals, degree of difficulty, spreads between thresholds, targets and maximum payouts,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vi) the maximum payout levels and caps,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vii) the clawback policy,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (viii) the retirement program design and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ix) the equity ownership and equity ownership and retention guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These items were assessed in the context of the most significant risks currently facing the Company, to determine if the compensation plans, practices and programs incentivize employees to take undue risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee then took into account controls and procedures that operate to monitor and mitigate against risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chief Human Resources Officer presented the compensation risk committees conclusions to the Compensation & Human Resources Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These conclusions were also reviewed by the Compensation & Human Resources Committees independent compensation consultant, Meridian Compensation Partners LLC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation & Human Resources Committee reviewed these conclusions through a risk assessment lens.

sentences.text: As a result of these reviews, the Company does not believe that the Companys compensation practices and programs create risks that are reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on the Company, nor does it believe that the practices and programs are designed to promote risk taking.

sentences.text: On December 14, 2010, the Board of Directors approved the adoption of the Moodys Corporation Change in Control Severance Plan (the CICP).
